home.text_base_description: Newly-converted 2BR/1BA bright condo in friendly 4-unit 1920s building. Sharp, newly-painted exterior! Architect-owner has put in all the thoughtful extras that you don't find often: New Marvin double-glazed, acoustically rated and screened windows that tilt in for cleaning, Rejuvenation Schoolhouse ceiling lights throughout, remodeled bath, acoustically insulated ceiling system, new forced air heating with ductwork to all rooms, blackout shades in both bedroomsover 150K of upgrades since 2014! Eat-in kitchen with Thermador appliances and custom white cabinets keep it modern, while refinished hardwood floors, crown molding & glass-paned French doors nod to an earlier time. Freshly-painted interior, in-unit stacked W/ D and large closets invite you to move in & enjoy. 1 car private garage w/ interior access and TWO generously-sized separate storage rooms seal the deal. Fantastic Mission location - easy access to BART, public transportation & freeways as well as shops, restaurants & cafes
